description:
This course will lead you beyond the introduction, through the setup process, and across the finish line where you send your first email with Klaviyo!

What some clients say about my courses:

"Edvin Lynch is a master teacher." – Francisco Urosa

"Edvin is my favorite Udemy teacher, I have learnt an incredible amount of knowledge from all his courses!" – Sarah Anderson

You will get months worth of INSIDER Knowledge, simplified and contextualized, along with expert strategies and insights so you can become the best digital marketer and start providing Email Marketing as a service for a client, or to help your own business take off flying, and make money effectively on Auto-Pilot!

In this course you will learn about:

  • Drip Email Campaigns
  • Email Auto-responders
  • Personalized Newsletters
  • A/B Testing Campaigns
  • Drag & Drop Email Builder
  • Mobile Optimized Emails
  • Email Flows (Email Auto-Pilot)
  • See Individual Insights About All Subscribers
  • Send Direct Emails To Anyone In Your List

Yes! There is proven cost-effective marketing success and it starts with this very exclusive "insider" course. (Free for all members of the LLC Insider Group)

  • If you're a Small Business Owner, Startup or Entrepreneur…this is for you!
  • If you're a Marketer, Affiliate Marketer or Marketing Consultant…you'll love this!
  • If you want to market literally ANY product or service…get ready to take some quality notes!

Your instructor, Edvin Lynch, has personally invested countless months researching, experimenting, testing and compiling everything he knows about building and running a business from the ground up, outfitted with full-scale marketing on Zero Budget. He has used this knowledge to establish his own Creative Agency (LLC). This is not theory or hype, this is real, and he shows how simple it can be in this course.

Edvin has designed and managed multiple campaigns, million dollar campaigns and epic campaigns, for himself and his clients (yes, on a Zero Budget). Edvin has also taught many entrepreneurs, business owners, marketers, marketing managers, authors and consultants like you, to do the same.

Got a book, info-product, event, or anything else that you want to promote? Want to create beautiful newsletters? Want to maximize your profits? Look No Further!
title: Email Marketing Automation for All Businesses
